name: Project Rose
description:
· This is a third person shooter role-playing game!
The player takes on the role of a sexy, beautiful woman on death row who is given a contract by a mysterious organization to continue living under a new identity in exchange for working for the organization.
· Rich plot: Assisting the police, shooting criminals, defusing bombs, rescuing hostages.
· Unique third-person shooting feel.
· 3D model.
· The beautiful female protagonist is waiting for you!
